Layout.Name: AlternateLanguageID
Layout.Comment: The AlternateLanguageID object describes information about the alternate human language used for the reservation.

Layout.Name: LanguageID
Layout.Comment: A string identifying the alternate human language for this profile.

Layout.Name: AlternateLanguageIDs
Layout.Comment: A collection item used as a container for multiple AlternateLanguageID objects. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of AlternateLanguageIDs are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: CreditCard
Layout.Comment: Information about the credit card used for the reservation.

Layout.Name: CCCode
Layout.Comment: The code of the bank or credit agency that issued the credit card. (e.g., MasterCard, American Express, Visa, etc.), by industry standard code.

Layout.Name: CCHolderName
Layout.Comment: Name as it appears on the credit card.

Layout.Name: CCNumber
Layout.Comment: Number as it appears on the credit card.

Layout.Name: CCBeginDate
Layout.Comment: Date credit card becomes effective. Local time wherever it is used (i.e., no conversion necessary).

Layout.Name: CCExpire
Layout.Comment: Date of expiration as it appears on the credit card. Local time wherever it is used (i.e., no conversion necessary).

Layout.Name: ElectronicAddress
Layout.Comment: An electronic address object is used by the Profile object to store phone numbers, email addresses, etc. for a profile.

Layout.Name: ElectronicAddressType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = E-mail, 2 = Fax, 3 = Home Phone, 4 = Business Phone, 5 = Mobile Phone, 6 = Telex, 7 = Pager, 8 = Web Page.

Layout.Name: EAddress
Layout.Comment: The electronic address string, such as e-mail address or (.url) web page location.

Layout.Name: ElectronicAddresses
Layout.Comment: A collection item used as a container for multiple ElectronicAddress objects. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of ElectronicAddresses are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: Extension
Layout.Comment: Identification of the data format for electronic authorization, such as a signature, retinal scan, fingerprint, etc.

Layout.Name: ContentCode
Layout.Comment: Code uniquely identifying the format, such as jpeg, .gif, .bmp, etc.

Layout.Name: ContentData
Layout.Comment: Vendor-specific data about the extension.

Layout.Name: Description
Layout.Comment: Human-readable description of the type of data in the ContentData attribute.

Layout.Name: Extensions
Layout.Comment: A collection item used as a container for multiple Extension objects. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of Extensions are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: Membership
Layout.Comment: The Profile object uses Membership objects to store frequent guest or other membership information for a profile.

Layout.Name: ProgramCode
Layout.Comment: The code or name of the membership program (e.g., "HERTZ," "AADVANTAGE," etc.).

Layout.Name: AccountID
Layout.Comment: The account or membership identifier for this particular member in this particular program.

Layout.Name: LevelCode
Layout.Comment: Used in points programs, etc., to represent the relative amount of credit awarded to this particular member, or his particular status within the program (VIP, Platinum, etc.).

Layout.Name: MembershipCategory
Layout.Comment: It could be used to accommodate loyalty programs, defining the type of program, whether a frequent flyer, hotel program, car rental, etc.

Layout.Name: ExpireDate
Layout.Comment: Indicates when this membership expires.

Layout.Name: SignupDate
Layout.Comment: Indicates when the member signed-up for the membership.

Layout.Name: StartDate
Layout.Comment: Indicates when this membership starts.

Layout.Name: Memberships
Layout.Comment: A collection item used as a container for multiple Membership objects. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of Memberships are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: Document
Layout.Comment: Information about identity papers, including Military ID's, driver's license, passports, etc. for a guest.

Layout.Name: Name
Layout.Comment: The person's name as it appears on the document.

Layout.Name: Number
Layout.Comment: Document number (as applicable).

Layout.Name: CountryCode
Layout.Comment: The ISO standard country code of the country that issued the document.

Layout.Name: Nationality
Layout.Comment: The ISO standard (country code) for the nationality of the guest, which may differ from the identity document(s).

Layout.Name: EffectiveDate
Layout.Comment: The effective date when the document becomes valid.

Layout.Name: ExpirationDate
Layout.Comment: The expiration date when the document becomes invalid.

Layout.Name: DocumentCode
Layout.Comment: The document code describing the type of document captured for this profile.

Layout.Name: PlaceOfIssue
Layout.Comment: The place (location) where the document was issued.

Layout.Name: Documents
Layout.Comment: A collection item used as a container for multiple Document objects. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of Documents are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: AddressType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Home, 2 = Business, 3 = Mailing, 4 = Shipping/receiving, 5=Billing.

Layout.Name: PostalAddress
Layout.Comment: The Profile object uses PostalAddress objects to store postal addresses for a profile.

Layout.Name: AddressType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Home, 2 = Business, 3 = Mailing, 4 = Shipping/receiving, 5=Billing.

Layout.Name: Address1
Layout.Comment: Line 1 of the address.

Layout.Name: Address2
Layout.Comment: Line 2 of the address.

Layout.Name: Address3
Layout.Comment: Line 3 of the address.

Layout.Name: Address4
Layout.Comment: Line 4 of the address.

Layout.Name: City
Layout.Comment: The city locale for the postal address.

Layout.Name: StateCode
Layout.Comment: The ISO/postal service standard for state codes.

Layout.Name: PostalCode
Layout.Comment: The postal service standard (e.g., Zip codes) for locality codes.

Layout.Name: CountryCode
Layout.Comment: The ISO 3-character standard country code.

Layout.Name: PostalAddresses
Layout.Comment: A collection item used as a container for multiple PostalAddress objects. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of PostalAddresses are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: CertificationType
Layout.Comment: Describes the type of profile certification. Values: 1 = IATA, 2 = ARC, 3 = Other.

Layout.Name: ProfileCertification
Layout.Comment: Validation or accreditation information for a profile (e.g., IATA, ARC, etc.).

Layout.Name: CertificationType
Layout.Comment: Describes the type of profile certification. Values: 1 = IATA, 2 = ARC, 3 = Other.

Layout.Name: CertificationID
Layout.Comment: This is the standard of whatever group is responsible for this type (e.g., the IATA number).

Layout.Name: ProfileCertifications
Layout.Comment: A collection item used as a container for multiple ProfileCertification objects. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of ProfileCertifications are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: PhoneNumber
Layout.Comment: Telephone numbers for a guest or agency profile. This object could be used in a dial-up mode to send a voicemail or fax confirmation of a reservation.

Layout.Name: CountryAccessNumber
Layout.Comment: This is the country access identifier (ISO standard) used at the beginning of the telephone number to identify the country initiating the telephone call.

Layout.Name: CityCode
Layout.Comment: In the U.S., Canada, etc., this is the area code.

Layout.Name: PhoneNumber
Layout.Comment: This is the telephone number assigned to the specific profile.

Layout.Name: PhoneExtension
Layout.Comment: This is the telephone number extension assigned to the specific profile.

Layout.Name: PhoneNumberType
Layout.Comment: This attribute describes the telephone number type assigned to the specific profile. Values: 1 = E-mail, 2 = Fax, 3 = Home Phone, 4 = Business Phone, 5 = Mobile Phone, 6 = Telex, 7 = Pager, 8 = Web Page.

Layout.Name: PhoneNumbers
Layout.Comment: A collection item used as a container for multiple PhoneNumber objects. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of PhoneNumbers are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: NameInfo
Layout.Comment: Profile objects for guests use a Name object to store an individual’s name.

Layout.Name: NamePrefix
Layout.Comment: The prefix name (e.g., Mr., Mrs., Ms., Miss, Dr., etc.).

Layout.Name: NameFirst
Layout.Comment: The guest's first name.

Layout.Name: NameMiddle
Layout.Comment: Guest's middle name.

Layout.Name: NameSur
Layout.Comment: Guest's last name. (Implementation note: systems that do not parse guest names into component parts should store the entire name in this field.)

Layout.Name: NameSuffix
Layout.Comment: Guest's suffix (e.g., Jr., Sr., III, etc.).

Layout.Name: NameTitle
Layout.Comment: Guest's title (e.g., Ph.D., etc.).

Layout.Name: NameOrdered
Layout.Comment: The proper name in the correct order. To be used in correspondence, or when the CRS ships a reservation as a single string. The PMS may store the name as a string, or parse it into the parts of a name in the attributes above. Neither is mutually exclusiv

Layout.Name: Profile
Layout.Comment: A profile represents an individual guest or the corporate entity or person responsible for a reservation or hotel activity. The ProfileType property determines what type of entity is represented. Note that the GenericName property is used for all profil

Layout.Name: ProfileType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Guest, 2 = Corporate Account, 3 = Travel Agency, 4 = Wholesaler, 5 = Group, 6 = Tour Operator, 7=Destination CRO, 8=Contact (specific employee at a corporate office or travel agency, for example).

Layout.Name: ProfileID
Layout.Comment: The unique identifier used to reference this profile. For profiles being sent to a server, the sender's identifier should be used if the receiver is doing the translating and vice versa. (For new profiles in the case where the sender is doing the transl

Layout.Name: CreatorCode
Layout.Comment: Code of the system that originally created this profile.

Layout.Name: CreatedDate
Layout.Comment: Date and time this profile was created.

Layout.Name: LastUpdaterCode
Layout.Comment: Code of the system that last updated this profile.

Layout.Name: LastUpdated
Layout.Comment: Date and time this profile was last updated.

Layout.Name: ConsortiumCode
Layout.Comment: For travel agent profiles; code representing consortium to which this profile belongs.

Layout.Name: CommissionPlanCode
Layout.Comment: Commission paid to this profile for booking activity (defined as a string to allow for percentages, currency amounts, codes, etc.).

Layout.Name: PreferredRatePlan
Layout.Comment: Code of the preferred or associated rate plan for this profile.

Layout.Name: PreferredRoomType
Layout.Comment: Enumerated types to be defined, presumed to be based upon typical room types used in the industry..

Layout.Name: GenericName
Layout.Comment: For non-guest profiles; the name of the profile.

Layout.Name: IndividualName
Layout.Comment: For guest profiles; the proper name of the guest.

Layout.Name: Gender
Layout.Comment: Defines the sexual preference for the individual. Can be used in a salutation for a confirmation letter.

Layout.Name: CorporatePosition
Layout.Comment: For guest and contact profiles; the position or job title of the profile.

Layout.Name: PIN
Layout.Comment: Personal Identification Number used by guest. Whether or not and how to encrypt this is implementation-specific.

Layout.Name: DateOfBirth
Layout.Comment: For guest profiles; guest’s birthday (local time to place of birth).

Layout.Name: ExpirationDate
Layout.Comment: Indicates when this profile expires (and, presumably, may safely be deleted).

Layout.Name: CreditLimit
Layout.Comment: Limit on the credit available for this profile.

Layout.Name: PrimaryLanguageID
Layout.Comment: ISO standard. Preferred human language for this profile.

Layout.Name: AlternateLanguageIDs
Layout.Comment: Collection of strings representing alternate human languages for this profile. Note that the Add operation on this collection should create a new string, then copy the passed parameter into it. So, no CreateLanguageID operation is needed. Application c

Layout.Name: Documents
Layout.Comment: For guest profiles; a collection of documents (e.g., passports) used by the guest.

Layout.Name: CreditCards
Layout.Comment: A collection of credit cards associated with this profile.

Layout.Name: ElectronicAddresses
Layout.Comment: A collection of electronic addresses (e.g., phone numbers, e-mail, etc.) for this profile.

Layout.Name: Extensions
Layout.Comment: A collection of vendor-specific extensions to this profile object.

Layout.Name: Memberships
Layout.Comment: A collection of memberships (e.g., frequent guest programs, etc.) for this profile.

Layout.Name: PostalAddresses
Layout.Comment: A collection of street or postal addresses for this profile.

Layout.Name: PhoneNumbers
Layout.Comment: A collection of telephone numbers for this profile.

Layout.Name: ProfileCertifications
Layout.Comment: A collection of certifications for this profile (e.g., IATA, ARC, etc.).

Layout.Name: ProfileReferences
Layout.Comment: A collection of profile references indicating profiles related to this profile. For example, if this is a contact profile, an element of this collection would be the corporate office or travel agency the contact works for.

Layout.Name: SpecialRequests
Layout.Comment: A collection of special requests this profile has requested. See CRS Guest Stay Information document for object model.

Layout.Name: Comment
Layout.Comment: Further information about this profile. Comments appended to the profile should be reported in chronological order and retained, therefore, the data type for this attribute is a collection (Comments).

Layout.Name: RoutingHops
Layout.Comment: A collection of routing hops for this profile. Details of the path(s) this notification has traveled. In practice, each system that passes this notification would append a routing hop object to this list before doing so. Then, when a notification is re

Layout.Name: Update
Layout.Comment: Send the completed object to the server (push model). The return parameter is the receiver’s identifier for this profile. (Implementation Notes: This would only be returned for a new profile when the sender is translating ProfileID values. In this case

Layout.Name: ProfileSession
Layout.Comment: The ProfileSession object represents the connection to the receiving server. This object profiles information from the server, and is used to return empty profile objects to the application to complete and send to the server.

Layout.Name: VersionMajor
Layout.Comment: A read-only decimal value that indicates the major version of the HITIS interface.

Layout.Name: VersionMinor
Layout.Comment: A read-only decimal value that indicates the minor version of the HITIS interface.

Layout.Name: Authenticate
Layout.Comment: Logs into the server and authenticates the user.
Layout.FieldValue: in string ServerName, in string UserName, in string Password

Layout.Name: CreateProfile
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty profile object to be completed and sent to the server.

Layout.Name: GetProfile
Layout.Comment: Query the server for a specific profile. The value passed in the ProfileID parameter is the server's identifier if the requester is doing the translating and vice versa.
Layout.FieldValue: in ProfileType profileType, in string ProfileID, in DateTime LastUpdated, out Profile profile

Layout.Name: QueryProfile
Layout.Comment: Returns a (hopefully small) collection of profile(s) meeting the specified criteria. If multiple criteria are specified, the setting of the AndFlag determines whether the search criteria are to be logically AND’ed (AndFlag=1) or OR’ed (AndFlag=0).
Layout.FieldValue: in CreditCard CreditCard, in EAddressType ElectronicAddress, in Membership Membership, in ProfileCertification Certification, in boolean AndFlag, out Profiles Profiles

Layout.Name: GetErrorString
Layout.Comment: Given an error code returned or generated from a previous function call, this method retrieves a custom error string defined by the PMS.
Layout.FieldValue: in long ErrorNumber, in string LanguageID, out string ErrorString

Layout.Name: Profiles
Layout.Comment: A collection item used as a container for multiple Profile objects. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of Profiles are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: AvailRateSession
Layout.Comment: The AvailRateSession object represents the connection to the server. This object also creates empty Notification objects to be filled out and sent to the server.

Layout.Name: VersionMajor
Layout.Comment: A read-only decimal value that indicates the major version of the HITIS interface.

Layout.Name: VersionMinor
Layout.Comment: A read-only decimal value that indicates the minor version of the HITIS interface.

Layout.Name: Authenticate
Layout.Comment: Logs into the server and authenticates the user.
Layout.FieldValue: in string ServerName, in string UserName, in string Password

Layout.Name: CreateAvailNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty availability notification object to be completed and sent.

Layout.Name: CreateRateAmountNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty rate notification object to be completed and sent.

Layout.Name: CreateHotelSummaryNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty hotel notification object to be completed and sent.

Layout.Name: CreateInventoryNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty inventory notification object to be completed and sent.

Layout.Name: CreateBookingRestrictionNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty booking restriction notification object to be completed and sent.

Layout.Name: CreateHotelContentNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty hotel content notification object to be completed and sent.

Layout.Name: GetErrorString
Layout.Comment: Given an error code returned or generated from a previous function call, this method retrieves a custom error string defined by the PMS.
Layout.FieldValue: in long ErrorNumber, in string LanguageID, out string ErrorString

Layout.Name: AvailNotification
Layout.Comment: The AvailNotification object is used to synchronize the availability status between different reservation systems

Layout.Name: ChainCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel chain that this availability applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: HotelCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel that this availability applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: BookingLimitStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of BookingLimitStatusMessage objects.

Layout.Name: FullPatternLOSStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of FullPatternLOSStatusMessage objects.

Layout.Name: MinMaxLOSStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of MinMaxLOSStatusMessage objects.

Layout.Name: RateHurdleStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of RateHurdleStatusMessage objects.

Layout.Name: SimplePatternStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of SimplePatternStatusMessage objects.

Layout.Name: CreateBookingLimitStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty BookingLimitStatusMessage object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: CreateFullPatternLOSStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty FullPatternStatusMessage object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: CreateMinMaxLOSStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty MinMaxLOSStatusMessage object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: CreateRateHurdleStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty BookingLimitStatusMessage object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: CreateSimplePatternStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty SimplePatternStatusMessage object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: Update
Layout.Comment: Sends the completed object to the server.

Layout.Name: Notification
Layout.Comment: **temp**

Layout.Name: BookingLimitStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: The set of booking limit availability status changes to be made on the server. The server must successfully update all messages. The failure of any single status message will result in the failure of all messages. A collection of one (1) is possible.

Layout.Name: BookingLimitStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: Status changes in the available booking limits that are to be made on the server.

Layout.Name: Index
Layout.Comment: Position of message within the collection. Can be used for error reporting, etc.

Layout.Name: MessageType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 =Remove limit, 2 = Set limit, 3 = Adjust Limit.

Layout.Name: Application
Layout.Comment: Defines where the booking limit should be applied.

Layout.Name: BookingLimit
Layout.Comment: Number of units.

Layout.Name: FullPatternLOSStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: The set of full pattern LOS availability status changes to be made on the server. The server must successfully update all messages. The failure of any single status message will result in the failure of all messages.

Layout.Name: FullPatternLOSStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: Open or close status changes that are to be made on the server based on length of stay.

Layout.Name: Index
Layout.Comment: Position of message within the collection. Can be used for error reporting, etc.

Layout.Name: StatusType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Close, 2 = Open, 3 = On Request.

Layout.Name: ArrivalsOnlyFlag
Layout.Comment: Indicates whether status applies to any stay or just to arrivals. Values: 0 = Any stay, 1 = Arrivals only.

Layout.Name: Application
Layout.Comment: Defines where the status should be applied.

Layout.Name: LOS
Layout.Comment: Collection (of Unsigned Integers)

Layout.Name: MinMaxLOSStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: The set of minimum/maximum length-of-stay availability status changes to be made on the server. The server must successfully update all messages. The failure of any single status message will result in the failure of all messages.

Layout.Name: MinMaxLOSStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: Minimum or maximum length of stay status changes.

Layout.Name: Index
Layout.Comment: Position of message within the collection. Can be used for error reporting, etc.

Layout.Name: MessageType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Set minimum LOS, 2 = Remove minimum LOS, 3=Set maximum LOS, 4 = Remove maximum LOS, 5 = Set forward minimum stay, 6 = Remove forward minimum stay, 7 = Set forward maximum stay, 8 = Remove forward maximum stay.

Layout.Name: ArrivalsOnlyFlag
Layout.Comment: Indicates whether LOS applies to any stay or just to arrivals. Values: 0 = Any stay, 1 = Arrivals only.

Layout.Name: Application
Layout.Comment: Defines where the status should be applied.

Layout.Name: LOS
Layout.Comment: Length of stay (ignored if MessageType = 2,4,6 or 8.)

Layout.Name: LOSTimeUnitType
Layout.Comment: A time unit used to apply this status message to other inventory, and with more granularity than daily. The TimeUnitType enumerated data type is defined in the Reservation Synchronization document.

Layout.Name: TimeUnitType
Layout.Comment: The TimeUnitType data type is an enumerated type with 7 values: 1 = Year, 2 = Month, 3 = Week, 4 = Day, 5 = Hour, 6 = Minutes, 7 = Seconds. The TimeUnitType identifies the units in which a duration of time is measured, as in DateTimeSpan

Layout.Name: RateHurdleStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: A collection object that returns the RateHurdleStatusMessage object(s).

Layout.Name: RateHurdleStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: The RateHurdleStatusMessage object is used to define the settings for Rate Hurdle Controls at the reservations system.

Layout.Name: Index
Layout.Comment: Position of message within the collection. Can be used for error reporting, etc.

Layout.Name: Application
Layout.Comment: Defines where the status should be applied.

Layout.Name: HurdleRate
Layout.Comment: Hurdle rate that must be matched or surpassed by net room rate from reservation (Reservation rate amount minus sum of internal costs from inclusive services).

Layout.Name: Delta
Layout.Comment: Value to add/subtract to the Rate Hurdle used to yield as transient reservations are made/cancelled.

Layout.Name: Ceiling
Layout.Comment: Upper limit on the number of Deltas that should be added to the Rate Hurdle for each transient reservation.

Layout.Name: MaxSold
Layout.Comment: Upper limit on the number of transient reservations that should be accepted.

Layout.Name: SimplePatternStatusMessages
Layout.Comment: The set of simple pattern availability status changes to be made on the server.

Layout.Name: SimplePatternStatusMessage
Layout.Comment: Simple open or close status changes that are to be made on the server.

Layout.Name: Index
Layout.Comment: Position of message within the collection. Can be used for error reporting, etc.

Layout.Name: StatusType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Close, 2 = Open, 3 = On Request.

Layout.Name: ArrivalsOnlyFlag
Layout.Comment: Indicates whether status applies to any stay or just to arrivals. Values: 0 = Any stay, 1 = Arrivals only.

Layout.Name: Application
Layout.Comment: Defines where the status should be applied.

Layout.Name: StatusApplicationControl
Layout.Comment: The StatusApplicationControl object is used to indicate to which block codes/rate plans/inventory codes a status should be applied.

Layout.Name: BlockCodeType
Layout.Comment: Values: 0 = Does not apply/BlockCode attribute not used, 1 = Block code, 2 = Block grouping code.

Layout.Name: BlockCode
Layout.Comment: Inventory block code (group, wholesaler block codes, etc.) or inventory block grouping codes. ALL = all room blocks.

Layout.Name: DaysOfWeek
Layout.Comment: The Days Of Week that applies to this status message.

Layout.Name: Override
Layout.Comment: Mechanism to allow the user to override settings at the reservation system and to allow the RMS to replace this overridden values: If 0, the reservations system may ignore the settings passed and keep values overridden by the user. If 1, the reservations

Layout.Name: DestinationSystemControl
Layout.Comment: A collection of Destination Code (strings of length 6) that define the viewership (distribution channels and authorized booking agents) for a message.

Layout.Name: RatePlanCodeType
Layout.Comment: Values: 0 = Does not apply/RatePlanCode attribute not used, 1 = Rate plan code, 2 = Rate plan grouping code.

Layout.Name: RatePlanCode
Layout.Comment: Rate plan code or rate plan grouping code (e.g. rate category code). ALL = apply to all rate plan codes.

Layout.Name: InventoryCodeType
Layout.Comment: Values: 0 = Does not apply/InventoryCode attribute not used, 1 = Inventory code, 2 = Inventory grouping code.

Layout.Name: InventoryCode
Layout.Comment: Inventory code (e.g. room type) or inventory grouping code. ALL = All inventory group codes.

Layout.Name: StartDate
Layout.Comment: Status changes start on this date.

Layout.Name: EndDate
Layout.Comment: Status changes end on and include this date.

Layout.Name: RateAmountNotification
Layout.Comment: The RateAmountNotification object is used to communicate changes in room rates between PMS and CRS.

Layout.Name: ChainCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel chain that this availability applies to as decided between vendors. (This is provided so that a single receiving system, like a PMS, can service multiple hotels.)

Layout.Name: HotelCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel that this availability applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: RateAmountMessages
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of RateAmountMessage objects

Layout.Name: CreateRateAmountMessage
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty rate message object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: Update
Layout.Comment: Send the completed object to the server.

Layout.Name: RateAmountMessages
Layout.Comment: Rate changes to be made on the server. The server must successfully update this entire collection. Failure to update any single status message will result in the failure of all messages. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations o

Layout.Name: RateAmountMessage
Layout.Comment: Rate changes that are to be made on the server based on date, day of week, rate and/or inventory code.

Layout.Name: RateAmounts
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of RateAmount objects.

Layout.Name: TaxAmounts
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of TaxAmount objects.

Layout.Name: CreateRateAmount
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty rate object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: CreateTaxAmount
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty tax object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: RateAmounts
Layout.Comment: Rate changes to be made on the server. The server must successfully update this entire collection.

Layout.Name: RateAmount
Layout.Comment: Individual rate amount changes that are to be made on the server.

Layout.Name: RateAmount
Layout.Comment: Amount/price of the base rate.

Layout.Name: DaysOfWeek
Layout.Comment: Days of the week for which the rate changes apply.

Layout.Name: MaxAdults
Layout.Comment: Maximum number of adults permitted in a room at this rate.

Layout.Name: AdditionalAdultAmounts
Layout.Comment: Incremental charges for additional adults.

Layout.Name: AdditionalChildAmounts
Layout.Comment: Incremental charges for children in the room.

Layout.Name: RateBasisNumUnits
Layout.Comment: The number of units of RateBasisType.

Layout.Name: RateBasisType
Layout.Comment: HITIS defined type with the values: hourly, daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual.

Layout.Name: CreateAdditionalAdultAmount
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty AddAdultAmount object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: CreateAdditionalChildAmount
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty AddChildAmount object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: AdditionalAdultAmounts
Layout.Comment: Incremental charges for additional adults. A collection of one (1) is possible.

Layout.Name: AdditionalAdultAmount
Layout.Comment: Amounts that are to be added to the base rate for additional adults in the room.

Layout.Name: MaxAdults
Layout.Comment: Increase the base rate by this object's Amount property for each additional adult up to this maximum number of adults.

Layout.Name: Amount
Layout.Comment: Incremental rate amount.

Layout.Name: AdditionalChildAmounts
Layout.Comment: Incremental charges for children in the room. A collection of one (1) is possible.

Layout.Name: AdditionalChildAmount
Layout.Comment: Amounts that are to be added to the base rate for (additional) children in the room. Since there is no base number of children in the room, all children amounts must be passed in this structure.

Layout.Name: AgeRangeCode
Layout.Comment: Age range that this rate increase applies to.

Layout.Name: MaxChild
Layout.Comment: Increase the base rate by the appropriate amount for each additional child up to this maximum number of children.

Layout.Name: AmountWithAdult
Layout.Comment: Incremental amount when accompanied by an adult.

Layout.Name: AmountWithOutAdult
Layout.Comment: Incremental amount when not accompanied by an adult.

Layout.Name: TaxAmounts
Layout.Comment: Tax information for this time period. A collection of one (1) is possible.

Layout.Name: TaxAmount
Layout.Comment: Tax charges that are applied to the rate. Note that this object allows for both percentages and currency amounts - one field will be used, and the other should be zero.

Layout.Name: TaxCode
Layout.Comment: Code identifying the tax (e.g., occupancy, city, etc.).

Layout.Name: TaxType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Inclusive, 2 = Exclusive, 3 = Cumulative. Note: If TaxType = 3, taxes are accumulated on all previous taxes in this ordered list. For example, if this collection contains 5 different taxes and the 4th tax is cumulative, the tax is based on an

Layout.Name: TaxAmount
Layout.Comment: Tax amount; if zero, use tax Percent (Amount or Percent must be a zero value).

Layout.Name: TaxPercent
Layout.Comment: Tax percentage; if zero, use Amount (Amount or Percent must be a zero value).

Layout.Name: Percentage
Layout.Comment: Percent is a data type derived from the Long data type (Signed Long). Percentage data can represent positive or negative fractional (less than 1) values. Values are scaled by 1 million to accommodate 4 decimal places, plus the two for the percentage. (For

Layout.Name: ChainCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel chain that this message applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: HotelCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel that this message applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: HotelSummaryMessages
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of HotelSummaryMessage objects.

Layout.Name: CreateHotelSummaryMessage
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty HotelSummaryMessage object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: Update
Layout.Comment: Sends the completed object to the server.

Layout.Name: HotelSummaryMessages
Layout.Comment: A collection of hotel summary messages. A collection of one (1) is possible.

Layout.Name: StartDate
Layout.Comment: Status changes start on this date.

Layout.Name: EndDate
Layout.Comment: Status changes end on and include this date.

Layout.Name: DayOfWeek
Layout.Comment: The Days Of Week that applies to this status message.

Layout.Name: StatusType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Closed, 2 = Open, 3 = On Request.

Layout.Name: RateMin
Layout.Comment: The minimum rate at which the hotel will sell an available room.

Layout.Name: RateMax
Layout.Comment: The maximum rate at which the hotel will sell an available room.

Layout.Name: InventoryNotification
Layout.Comment: The InventoryNotification object is used to synchronize the inventory numbers between different reservation systems.

Layout.Name: ChainCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel chain that this availability applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: HotelCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel that this availability applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: BaseInventoryMessages
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of BaseInventory objects.

Layout.Name: OffSellInventoryMessages
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of OffSellInventoryMessage objects.

Layout.Name: CreateBaseInventoryMessage
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty BaseInventoryMessage object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: CreateOffSellInventoryMessage
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty OffSellInventoryMessage object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: Update
Layout.Comment: Sends the completed object to the server.

Layout.Name: BaseInventoryMessages
Layout.Comment: The set of base inventory changes to be made on the server. The server must successfully update all messages. Failure to update any single status message will result in the failure of all messages.

Layout.Name: BaseInventoryMessage
Layout.Comment: Changes in the number of units of base inventory for one inventory type (code) to be made on the server.

Layout.Name: InventoryCode
Layout.Comment: Inventory code (e.g., room type codes, room attributes). ALL = All inventory codes.

Layout.Name: Inventory
Layout.Comment: Number of units.

Layout.Name: OffSellInventoryMessages
Layout.Comment: The set of off-sell inventory changes to be made on the server. The server must successfully update all messages. Failure to update any single status message will result in the failure of all messages.

Layout.Name: OffSellInventoryMessage
Layout.Comment: Changes in inventory that is not available for sale to be made on the server.

Layout.Name: OffSellReasonType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Out of order, 2 = Off market.

Layout.Name: OffSellValueType
Layout.Comment: Values : 1 = Total (should replace any existing value); 2= Adjustment (should be added to any existing value)

Layout.Name: StartDate
Layout.Comment: Status changes start on this date.

Layout.Name: EndDate
Layout.Comment: Status changes end on and include this date.

Layout.Name: InventoryCode
Layout.Comment: Inventory code (e.g., room type codes, room attributes). ALL = All inventory codes.

Layout.Name: Inventory
Layout.Comment: Number of units.

Layout.Name: ChainCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel chain that this availability applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: HotelCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel that this availability applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: Application
Layout.Comment: Defines where the status should be applied.

Layout.Name: BookingRestrictions
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of BookingRestriction objects.

Layout.Name: CreateBookingRestriction
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty BookingRestriction object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: Update
Layout.Comment: Sends the completed object to the server.

Layout.Name: BookingRestrictions
Layout.Comment: A collection of booking restriction messages. A collection of one (1) is possible.

Layout.Name: RestrictionPolicies
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of Rule objects that define the enumerated types used for Booking Restrictions.

Layout.Name: AdvanceBookingRequirement
Layout.Comment: See Rule object.

Layout.Name: MinMaxAdults
Layout.Comment: Defines the restrictions for minimum and maximum total occupants, adults and children.

Layout.Name: Rules
Layout.Comment: A collection object that returns multiple Rule objects. A collection of one (1) is possible.

Layout.Name: Rule
Layout.Comment: Defines the enumerated types used for Booking Restriction rules.

Layout.Name: PrePaymentPolicyType
Layout.Comment: Enumerated types used for PrePayment Restrictions.

Layout.Name: DepositPolicyType
Layout.Comment: Enumerated types used for Deposit Restrictions, eg: 1= Full Payment required, 2= Minimum amount required, 3= Voucher, etc.

Layout.Name: GuaranteePolicyType
Layout.Comment: Enumerated types used for Guarantee Restrictions.

Layout.Name: CancelPolicy
Layout.Comment: Enumerated types used for Cancel Restrictions.

Layout.Name: ModifyPolicyType
Layout.Comment: Enumerated types used for Modification Restrictions.

Layout.Name: AdvanceBookingRequirement
Layout.Comment: Enumerated types used for Advance Booking Restrictions.

Layout.Name: MinMaxAdults
Layout.Comment: Defines the booking restrictions for minimum and maximum total occupants, adults and children.

Layout.Name: MinTotalOccupants
Layout.Comment: Defines the minimum number of total occupants required for a rate plan.

Layout.Name: MaxTotalOccupants
Layout.Comment: Defines the maximum number of total occupants allowed for a rate plan.

Layout.Name: MinAdults
Layout.Comment: Defines the minimum number of adults required for a rate plan.

Layout.Name: MaxAdults
Layout.Comment: Defines the maximum number of adult allowed for a rate plan.

Layout.Name: MinChildred
Layout.Comment: Defines the minimum number of children required for a rate plan by AgeRangeCode.

Layout.Name: MaxChildred
Layout.Comment: Defines the maximum number of children allowed for a rate plan by AgeRangeCode.

Layout.Name: HotelContentNotification
Layout.Comment: The HotelContent Notification object is used to communicate hotel content data (HEDNA standard) to a server from the PMS.

Layout.Name: ChainCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel chain that this availability applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: HotelCode
Layout.Comment: Identification of the hotel that this availability applies to as decided between vendors.

Layout.Name: HotelContent
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of HotelContent objects.

Layout.Name: CreateHotelContent
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty HotelContent object to be added to the list.

Layout.Name: Update
Layout.Comment: Send the completed object to the server.

Layout.Name: AvailabilityQuery
Layout.Comment: An AvailabilityQuery object is used to request the return of applicable products and rates available for sale as determined by the requested parameters.

Layout.Name: ChainCode
Layout.Comment: Optional (i.e., the string may be empty). Refer to HotelCode.

Layout.Name: HotelCode
Layout.Comment: The combination of the chain and hotel codes uniquely identify the hotel this reservation applies to. (This is provided so that a single receiving system, like a PMS, can service multiple hotels.) Whether to use the sending/querying system’s or the receiv

Layout.Name: AvailRequestType
Layout.Comment: Values: 1 = Pricing only, 2 = Pricing and policies.

Layout.Name: RateCodes
Layout.Comment: A collection (optional) representing rate categories and codes to be considered for selection.

Layout.Name: RateMinCurrency
Layout.Comment: The minimum rate and currency specified for selection.

Layout.Name: RateMaxCurrency
Layout.Comment: The maximum rate and currency specified for selection.

Layout.Name: StayDateRange
Layout.Comment: Total time span covered by this availability request (earliest arrival to latest departure).

Layout.Name: Profiles
Layout.Comment: A collection of ProfileReference objects. These can be used to control access to rate plans, etc.

Layout.Name: Guests
Layout.Comment: A collection of Guest objects. See Guest Stay Info for model. Guests associated with this availability request.

Layout.Name: RoomStays
Layout.Comment: A collection of RoomStay objects. See Guest Stay Info for model. Room stays associated with this availability request.

Layout.Name: Services
Layout.Comment: A collection of Service objects. See Guest Stay Info for model. Services associated with this availability request.

Layout.Name: SpecialRequests
Layout.Comment: A collection of SpecialRequest objects. The special requests that are tied to this availability request.

Layout.Name: Query
Layout.Comment: Queries the server for availability records meeting the query criteria. Possible return codes are Successful, Alternates Provided, and Unsuccessful.

Layout.Name: RateCodes
Layout.Comment: Collection of rate plans (ie., Rack, Interline, etc.)

Layout.Name: Amount
Layout.Comment: Amount values are scaled by 1 million to accommodate the current European Union standard. The currency data type has a range of -2^63/1000000 to +(2^63-1)/1000000, or approximately -9 trillion to +9 trillion

Layout.Name: ByteArray
Layout.Comment: A Byte Array is an array of bytes (8-bit unsigned numeric non-fractional value), and is used for vendor-specific extensions (i.e., additions) of complex data to certain objects. For example, a guest profile may include a bitmap image of a photograph. A by

Layout.Name: DOWPattern
Layout.Comment: The Day of Week data type (DOWPattern) is an object with 7 Boolean attributes. i.e.: Sunday, Yes/No; Monday, Yes/No; Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, and Saturday, etc

Layout.Name: AvailabilityRecords
Layout.Comment: A collection of AvailabilityRecord objects. Since this list is only accessed in a pull model, no Add operation is needed. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of AvailabilityRecord are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: AvailabilityRecord
Layout.Comment: An AvailabilityRecord object is used to communicate the return of available products and rates.

Layout.Name: MarketingText
Layout.Comment: Informational lines to be presented with the display.

Layout.Name: Details
Layout.Comment: A collection of AvailabilityRecordDetail objects.

Layout.Name: AvailabilityRecordDetails
Layout.Comment: A collection of AvailabilityRecordDetail objects. Since this list is only accessed in a pull model, no Add operation is needed. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of AvailabilityRecordDetail are inherited from the Collectio

Layout.Name: AvailabilityRecordDetail
Layout.Comment: An AvailabilityRecordDetail object is used to communicate the specifics of an available product and rate.

Layout.Name: RatePlanCode
Layout.Comment: The representation of the rate plan for this detail record. Whether to use the querying system’s code or the responding system’s code depends on which is doing the translating.

Layout.Name: InventoryCode
Layout.Comment: The representation of the room type for this detail record. Whether to use the querying system’s code or the responding system’s code depends on which is doing the translating.

Layout.Name: IsRoom
Layout.Comment: Whether the InventoryCode represents a room product or a non-room product. Whether to use the querying system’s code or the responding system’s code depends on which is doing the translating.

Layout.Name: DateRange
Layout.Comment: Dates during which the following RateAmounts are effective.

Layout.Name: RateAmounts
Layout.Comment: Pricing info. See Avail/Rate Sync spec for model.

Layout.Name: Policies
Layout.Comment: A collection of Policy objects. The policies are tied to specific offerings.

Layout.Name: Policies
Layout.Comment: A collection of Policy objects. Since this list is only accessed in a pull model, no Add operation is needed. A collection of one (1) is possible. The attributes and operations of Policy are inherited from the Collection object.

Layout.Name: Policy
Layout.Comment: A Policy object specifies textual information pertaining to policies and/or restrictions that apply to a product or set of products.

Layout.Name: PolicyType
Layout.Comment: An enumerated data type for policy types. Values: 1 = Cancellation, 2 = Deposit, 3= Advance Purchase, 4 = Tax, 5 = Guarantee.

Layout.Name: PolicyText
Layout.Comment: A textual description of the policy or restriction.

Layout.Name: ReservationSession
Layout.Comment: The ReservationSession object represents the connection to the reservation server. This object is used to return empty notification objects to the application, so they can be filled out and sent to the server (push model), or to query the server for notif

Layout.Name: VersionMajor
Layout.Comment: A read-only decimal value that indicates the major version of the HITIS interface.

Layout.Name: VersionMinor
Layout.Comment: A read-only decimal value that indicates the minor version of the HITIS interface.

Layout.Name: Authenticate
Layout.Comment: Logs into the server and authenticates the user.
Layout.FieldValue: in string ServerName, in string UserName, in string Password

Layout.Name: CreateReservationNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty reservation notification object to be completed and sent (push model).

Layout.Name: GetErrorString
Layout.Comment: Given an error code returned or generated from a previous function call, this method retrieves a custom error string defined by the PMS.
Layout.FieldValue: in long ErrorNumber, in string LanguageID, out string ErrorString

Layout.Name: GetLastReservationNotificationSequenceNumber
Layout.Comment: Returns the sequence number of the last ReservationNotification object sent by this user (push model) or retrieved by this user (pull model) to allow for re-sync.

Layout.Name: GetLastGroupBlockNotificationSequenceNumber
Layout.Comment: Returns the sequence number of the last GroupBlockNotification object sent by this user (push model) or retrieved by this user (pull model) to allow for re-sync.

Layout.Name: CreateReservationRequest
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty reservation request object to be completed and sent.

Layout.Name: CreateGroupBlockNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty group block notification object to be completed and sent (push model).

Layout.Name: GetUnretrievedReservationNotifications
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of ReservationNotifications pending for this user (pull model).

Layout.Name: GetUnretrievedGroupBlockNotifications
Layout.Comment: Returns a collection of GroupBlockNotifications pending for this user (pull model).

Layout.Name: GetReservationNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns a specific ReservationNotification object, for example if the querying system is missing one (pull model).

Layout.Name: GetGroupBlockNotification
Layout.Comment: Returns a specific GroupBlockNotification object, for example if the querying system is missing one (pull model).

Layout.Name: QueryReservationNotifications
Layout.Comment: Returns all notifications for the given ReservationID (pull model). This is the server’s ReservationID, since in the pull model, the server cannot know the querying system’s ReservationID.

Layout.Name: QueryGroupBlockNotifications
Layout.Comment: Returns all notifications for the given GroupBlockID (pull model). This is the server’s GroupBlockID, since in the pull model, the server cannot know the querying system’s GroupBlockID.

Layout.Name: CreateAvailabilityQuery
Layout.Comment: Returns an empty availability query object to be completed and sent.
